name: Find Yer Treasure!
description:
"Find Yer Treasure!" is a game I made for the 2014 7Day Roguelike Challenge. 

It's an arcade style rogue-like in a pirate setting. The game play is fast paced and simple. Try to collect the most valuable treasures to get a high score! Every time you play is different!

Make sure you view the in-game help for a list of controls.
